texts.name: Sunnir
texts.biography: The Sunnir family has lived in Deyja for generations. Since childhood, Sunnir dreamed of discovering the world and accomplishing great deeds, but as a goblin, she could only serve as a servant to the necromancers. However, her lack of experience in combat means that she would never gain respect among the goblins of Krewlod. Joining Kastore's army is the perfect opportunity for her to prove her worth.
